resources.string: "Say \"XiaoAi TongXue\" into your phone to activate XiaoAi TongXue's voice controls."
"Say \"XiaoAi TongXue\" into your phone when the screen is on to activate XiaoAi TongXue's voice controls."
Say \"XiaoAi TongXue\" into your phone so XiaoAi TongXue could learn what your voice sounds like and activate voice controls after that.
Say \"XiaoAi TongXue\" into your phone when the screen is on so XiaoAi TongXue could learn what your voice sounds like and activate voice controls after that.
"\"XiaoAi TongXue, What is the weather like today?\""
Turn on to activate XiaoAi TongXue using your voice
Turn on to activate XiaoAi TongXue when the screen is on using your voice
提示: 开启后可以语音唤醒小爱同学,但会增加耗电量(每小时多耗1%电量)
手机分身下，暂不支持语音唤醒
Give the required permissions so voice controls could work normally.

Just say \"XiaoAi TongXue\" into your phone a couple of times so XiaoAi TongXue could learn what your voice sounds like. After that, XiaoAi TongXue will activate its voice assistant whenever you say \"XiaoAi TongXue\" into your phone.
XiaoAi TongXue is ready to help
Tap \"Done\" and XiaoAi TongXue will activate its voice assistant whenever you say \"XiaoAi TongXue\" into your phone.
Tap \"Done\" and XiaoAi TongXue will activate its voice assistant when the screen is on whenever you say \"XiaoAi TongXue\" into your phone.
You can still press and hold the button on XiaoAi TongXue to activate voice controls.

"Some important data will be deleted permanently, which may affect the way voice controls work.
Despite that, XiaoAi TongXue will continue working like before.
Freeing up storage space might take some time."
Looks like a different app is using the microphone right now. Stop the ongoing recording and try again.
您操作频率过快 请稍后再试
